Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toTerminal

Class TerminalViewer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.interfaces.Viewer
it.polimi.ingsw.view.clientSide.viewers.toTerminal.TerminalViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class TerminalViewer
extends Viewer
Viewer referring to the Terminal and managing it (and its' working). It was used into the first development stages and then left apart. It hasn't been removed because of it's possible utility in the future development.

    • refresh

    • enqueue

      protected void enqueue​(Viewer.ViewerQueuedEvent event)
      Method that adds a ViewerQueuedEvent to the blockingQueue. It'll add all the ViewerQueuedEvent that cannot be executed immediately and so will be retrieved by a different thread. It immediately prints the Messages.
      Overrides:
      enqueue in class Viewer
      Parameters:
      event - (the ViewerQueuedEvent to add to the BlockingQueue).
